channel.title: I need some fricin help here! want a challenge~?~
channel.description:
ok GUYS, I HAVE A PROBLEM....
in my server, whenever i click prayer (e.g protect against magic) it drains really quickly!! does anyone know at all how to frickin fix this? highly appreciated!!
~~WaleedScape~~

u know what, ur right pl0x ill look, and ill make my way to the top!
(as if… :P) thanks for the advice

item.title: I need some fricin help here! want a challenge~?~
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

0 - Attack 1 - Defence 2 - Strength 3 - Hitpoints 4 - Ranged 5 - Prayer 6 - Magic 7 - Cooking 8 - Woodcutting 9 - Fletching 10 - Fishing 11 - Firemaking 12 - Crafting 13 - Smithing 14 - Mining 15 - Herblore 16 - Agility 17 - Thieving 18 - Slayer 19 - Farming 20 - Runecrafting 21 - Hunter 22 - Construction 23 - Summoning

So since your looking for prayer, you need to search for a skill id of 5. I don’t do anything for 317’s anymore. I think its like [5] if you search for it. Not entirely sure
-Emily

Read full topic

so, please, gimme a break[/quote]
I know you are. . .
I wasit being mean. . .
It’s common knowdagle to ANYONE to know what I was talking about…

item.title: I need some fricin help here! want a challenge~?~
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:4, topic:339323”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=435707.msg3200142#msg3200142 date=1273259470]

ok GUYS, I HAVE A PROBLEM…

in my server, whenever i click prayer (e.g protect against magic) it drains really quickly!!
does anyone know at all how to frickin fix this? highly appreciated!!

WaleedScape

Search the player ID, or the amount of prayer drained from 1 thing.
Search it in like. . .client.java player.java, just the most common sense files to search.
And than change it.
[/quote]

Explained it quite well, this is not a spoon feeding community. Search through your files for prayer, and find the timer set on it. Easy to fix.[/quote]
Thank you.

Read full topic
